metadata.Title: CVE-2016-5637 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description:
The restore_tqb_pixels function in libbpg 0.9.5 through 0.9.7 mishandlesthe transquant_bypass_enable_flag value, which allows remote attackers toexecute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds write)via a crafted BPG image, related to a "type confusion" issue.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-5637` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ffmpeg - 2.6
libavcodec-extra - 2.6
libavcodec-extra59 - 2.6
libavcodec59 - 2.6
libavdevice59 - 2.6
libavfilter-extra - 2.6
libavfilter-extra8 - 2.6
libavfilter8 - 2.6
libavformat-extra - 2.6
libavformat-extra59 - 2.6
libavformat59 - 2.6
libavutil57 - 2.6
libpostproc56 - 2.6
libswresample4 - 2.6
libswscale6 - 2.6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ffmpeg package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.6').
gst-libav1.0 package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
